column5: Support WebScripts' Advertisers! Support WebScripts' Advertisers! Examples Listed below are a variety of sites on which you can see the various scripts from the WebScripts collection in action. Visit them to get a feel for how others are already using the programs. Remember, though, that these are real sites; please don't post "test" messages on forums or otherwise make yourself a nuisance to the sites' owners! Please also remember that I have nothing to do with most of these sites, so
